params._minWithdrawalAmount: Minimum balance before a withdrawal can be triggered.
params._recipient: Wallet that will receive the fees on L1.

renounceOwnership().details: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newMessenger: The address of messenger to update.

params._newMinWithdrawAmount: The minimum withdraw amount to update.

params._newRecipient: The address of recipient to update.

params._value: The amount of ETH to withdraw.

minWithdrawAmount().notice: Minimum balance before a withdrawal can be triggered.

owner().notice: The address of the current owner.

recipient().notice: Wallet that will receive the fees on L1.

renounceOwnership().notice: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.

totalProcessed().notice: Total amount of wei processed by the contract.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().notice: Triggers a withdrawal of all available funds to the L1 fee wallet.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Triggers a withdrawal of funds to the L1 fee wallet.

documentation.text: @notice Minimum balance before a withdrawal can be triggered.
@notice Wallet that will receive the fees on L1.
@notice Total amount of wei processed by the contract.
@notice Allow the contract to receive ETH.

arguments.value: FeeVault: withdrawal amount must be greater than minimum withdrawal amount

documentation.text:
@notice Triggers a withdrawal of funds to the L1 fee wallet.
 @param _value The amount of ETH to withdraw.
@notice Triggers a withdrawal of all available funds to the L1 fee wallet.

@notice Update the address of messenger.
 @param _newMessenger The address of messenger to update.

@notice Update the address of recipient.
 @param _newRecipient The address of recipient to update.

 @param _newMinWithdrawAmount The minimum withdraw amount to update.
